name: Persistent Search v1.0.4
description: A library that implements Google Play like PersistentSearch view.

name: Glide v4.0.0-RC1
description: An image loading and caching library for Android focused on smooth scrolling

name: RecyclerView Animators v2.2.6
description: RecyclerView Animators is an Android library that allows developers to easily create RecyclerView with animations.

name: EventBus v3.0.0
description: Android optimized event bus that simplifies communication between Activities, Fragments, Threads, Services, etc. Less code, better quality

name: SmartTabLayout v1.6.1
description: A custom ViewPager title strip which gives continuous feedback to the user when scrolling.

name: Progress Layout v1.0.1
description: An extension of RelativeLayout that helps show loading, empty and error layout.

name: Floating Toolbar v1.4.4
description: A toolbar that morphs from a FloatingActionButton, Inspired by the material design spec: https://material.io/guidelines/components/buttons-floating-action-button.html.

name: PhotoView v2.1.2
description: PhotoView aims to help produce an easily usable implementation of a zooming Android ImageView.

name: Material Dialogs: Core v0.9.4.5
description: A beautiful, fluid, and customizable dialogs API.

name: Material Tap Target Prompt
description: A Tap Target implementation in Android based on Material Design Onboarding guidelines.

name: ChangeLog Library
description: ChangeLog Library provides an easy way to display a change log in your Android app.

name: google-gson v2.8.0
description: A Java serialization/deserialization library to convert Java Objects into JSON and back

name: jsoup: Java HTML Parser v1.10.3
description: jsoup is a Java library for working with real-world HTML. It provides a very convenient API for extracting and manipulating data, using the best of DOM, CSS, and jquery-like methods.
